html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-00522018-02-02,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (2014, 2015 and 2016 Livestock Deferrals)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (2014, 2015 and 2016 Livestock Deferral) in order to (1) act on the advice of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada as to which regions should be prescribed regions on the basis that they have experienced drought or excess moisture conditions; and (2) implement the extension of the tax deferral in respect of bees.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0012 Publication Date: 2018-02-21
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (2014, 2015 and 2016 Livestock Deferrals)
precis: Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (2014, 2015 and 2016 Livestock Deferral) in order to (1) act on the advice of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada as to which regions should be prescribed regions on the basis that they have experienced drought or excess moisture conditions; and (2) implement the extension of the tax deferral in respect of bees.
